item.title: 纽约联储：迄今为止，人工智能对就业市场影响不大
item.description: 美联储纽约地区联储银行周四在一篇博客中说，到目前为止，美联储纽约地区企业对人工智能技术的采用率不断上升，但并没有对就业造成太大影响。【原文：Rising adoption of artificial intelligence technology by firms in the Federal Reserve's New York district has not been much of a job-killer so far, the regional Fed bank said in a blog on Thursday.】

item.title: Gap 将于今秋推出美容和个人护理产品
item.description: Gap 周四表示，今年秋季将进军快速增长的美容和个人护理领域，其中包括以 Old Navy 品牌销售的一些产品。【原文：Gap said on Thursday it would expand into the fast-growing beauty and personal care segment this fall season, including some sold under the Old Navy brand.】

item.title: Orsted 的 Revolution Wind 公司就项目停工问题起诉特朗普政府
item.description: 周四的一份法庭文件显示，丹麦风电场开发商 Orsted 的 Revolution Wind 合资企业已就美国政府阻止在罗德岛附近建造该项目的决定对唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府提起诉讼。【原文：Danish wind farm developer Orsted's Revolution Wind joint venture has filed a lawsuit against the administration of President Donald Trump over the U.S. government's decision to block construction of the project off Rhode Island, a court filing showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 7 月贸易逆差因进口飙升而扩大
item.description: 由于创纪录的资本和其他商品的流入推动了进口，美国 7 月份的贸易赤字急剧扩大。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit widened sharply in July as record inflows of capital and other goods boosted imports, a trend that if sustained could see trade subtracting from gross domestic product in the third quarter.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会公布改革加密货币规则和放宽华尔街规则的议程
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周四公布了其未来几个月的规则制定议程，其中可能包括修改加密货币法规和减少华尔街谴责的过于繁琐的规则的广泛建议。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday unveiled its rulemaking agenda for the upcoming months, which could see broad proposals to revamp cryptocurrency regulations and reduce rules that Wall Street has decried as being overly burdensome.】

item.title: 花旗集团向贝莱德转移 800 亿美元资产
item.description: 花旗集团周四表示，将把 800 亿美元的资产从其财富管理部门转移到贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc）。【原文：Citigroup will transfer $80 billion in assets from its wealth management unit to BlackRock Inc , the bank said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国小盘股爆发，但能持续多久？
item.description: 长期落后的美国小盘股正迎来阳光灿烂的时刻，但利率前景、盈利实力和经济健康状况将有助于确定它们是迎来了新的曙光，还是又一个错误的开始。【原文：Long-lagging U.S. small-cap stocks are having a moment in the sun, but the interest rate outlook, the strength of their earnings and the health of the economy will help determine whether they are experiencing a new dawn or another false start.】

item.title: 意大利时装设计师乔治-阿玛尼去世
item.description: 意大利时装设计师乔治-阿玛尼（Giorgio Armani）公司周四表示，乔治-阿玛尼已经去世。【原文：Italian fashion designer Giorgio Armani has died, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: Atlassian 6.1 亿美元收购浏览器公司，押注人工智能浏览器
item.description: Atlassian 周四表示，将以 6.1 亿美元现金收购总部位于纽约的初创公司 The Browser Company，进军快速拥挤的人工智能驱动型浏览器市场。【原文：Atlassian said on Thursday it will acquire New York-based startup The Browser Company for $610 million in cash, moving into the fast‑crowding market for AI‑driven browsers.】

item.title: 美国第二季度工人生产率大幅提高
item.description: 第二季度美国工人生产率的增长速度超过了最初的预期，从而抑制了劳动力成本的上升。【原文：U.S. worker productivity grew faster than initially thought in the second quarter, curbing the rise in labor costs.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数上升，劳动力市场趋于缓和
item.description: 上周，新申请失业救济金的美国人数量增幅超过预期，这与劳动力市场状况疲软一致。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits increased more than expected last week, consistent with softening labor market conditions.】

item.title: 尼泊尔封杀包括 Facebook 在内的部分社交媒体
item.description: 尼泊尔周四表示，由于包括 Facebook 在内的多个社交媒体平台未能在当局打击滥用行为的行动中进行登记，该国将阻止这些平台的访问。【原文：Nepal said on Thursday it would block access to several social media platforms, including Facebook, after they failed to register with authorities in a crackdown on misuse.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司扩大冬季航班计划，增加航班数量
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）周四表示，将扩大冬季航班计划，增加飞往劳德代尔堡、奥兰多和拉斯维加斯等 15 个城市的航班。【原文：United Airlines said on Thursday that it would expand its winter schedule and add flights to 15 cities including Fort Lauderdale, Orlando, and Las Vegas.】

item.title: 独家报道：通用汽车以需求疲软为由削减一家主要电动汽车工厂的产量
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府取消了对绿色汽车的联邦支持，通用汽车公司正在削减其一家主要电动汽车工厂的产量，这是最新一家削减电动汽车产量的汽车制造商。【原文：General Motors is cutting output at one of its main electric-vehicle factories, the latest automaker to pull back on EVs as U.S. President Donald Trump's administration yanks federal support for green cars.】

item.title: 美国 8 月私营部门就业人数不及预期
item.description: 由于劳动力市场状况趋于宽松，8 月份美国私营企业薪资增幅低于预期。【原文：U.S. private payrolls increased less than expected in August amid easing labor market conditions.】

item.title: 收购资产后，Lyten 重新启用 Northvolt 高管
item.description: Northvolt 的买家 Lyten 周四表示，它已任命这家破产的瑞典电池制造商的最后一任首席运营官担任 Lyten Sweden 的新首席执行官，同时还招聘了这家倒闭公司的其他几位前高管。【原文：Northvolt buyer Lyten said on Thursday it had appointed the last chief operating officer of the bankrupt Swedish battery maker as the new CEO of Lyten Sweden, and also recruited several other former executives of the failed company.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空将在 2027 年前利用亚马逊的 Kuiper 网络增强机上 Wi-Fi 功能
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周四表示，它将与亚马逊子公司低地球轨道卫星宽带互联网络 Kuiper 项目（Project Kuiper）合作，从 2027 年开始改善机上 Wi-Fi 服务。【原文：JetBlue Airways said on Thursday it will partner with Amazon subsidiary Project Kuiper, a low Earth orbit satellite broadband internet network, to improve its onboard Wi-Fi starting in 2027.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英伟达风险投资部门投资霍尼韦尔的 Quantinuum 公司
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，英伟达（Nvidia）的风险投资部门正在以 100 亿美元的估值投资霍尼韦尔的量子计算公司 Quantinuum。【原文：Nvidia's venture capital arm is investing in Honeywell's quantum computing company, Quantinuum, at a valuation of $10 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日立将投资 10 亿美元在美国生产电网组件
item.description: 日立公司能源部门周四表示，日立计划投资 10 亿美元扩大其在美国的电网基础设施制造，因为美国正面临着大科技公司建立人工智能数据中心所带来的创纪录的电力需求。【原文：Hitachi plans to invest $1 billion to expand its U.S. power grid infrastructure manufacturing, its energy unit said on Thursday, as the country faces record electricity demand from Big Tech's build-out of AI data centers.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，高盛将购买 10 亿美元的 T. Rowe 股票
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，高盛将向 T. Rowe Price Group 投资多达 10 亿美元，并将与该资产管理公司合作向散户投资者销售私募市场产品。【原文：Goldman Sachs will invest as much as $1 billion in T. Rowe Price Group and will partner with the asset manager to sell private market products to retail investors, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空第三季度收入降幅较小
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周四表示，预计第三季度每可用座位英里收入受到的冲击较小。【原文：JetBlue Airways said on Thursday it expects a smaller hit to its third quarter revenue per available seat mile.】

item.title: 高盛认为，如果投资者加大买入力度，金价将突破 4000 美元
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）表示，如果私人投资者更大程度地分散投资黄金，到 2026 年中期，金价可能会飙升至每盎司 4000 美元的基准线以上。【原文：Goldman Sachs said gold prices could surge well above its $4,000 per troy ounce baseline by mid-2026, should private investors diversify more heavily into the metal.】

item.title: 欧盟反垄断监管机构停止调查环球音乐与 Downtown 的交易
item.description: 欧盟委员会周四表示，欧盟反垄断监管机构已暂时停止对环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）旗下维珍音乐集团（Virgin Music Group）斥资 7.75 亿美元竞购 Downtown Music 的调查，同时等待所要求的信息。【原文：EU antitrust regulators have temporarily halted an investigation into Universal Music Group unit Virgin Music Group's $775-million bid for Downtown Music while awaiting requested information, the European Commission said on Thursday.】

item.title: 印尼将前部长和 Gojek 创始人作为贪污案嫌疑人拘留
item.description: 印尼调查人员周四将前教育部长、打车公司 Gojek 联合创始人纳迪姆-马卡里姆（Nadiem Makarim）列为一起涉嫌不当采购笔记本电脑的腐败案件的嫌疑人，并表示他已被拘留。【原文：Indonesian investigators on Thursday named a former education minister and co-founder of ride-hailing firm Gojek, Nadiem Makarim, as a suspect in a corruption case about alleged improper laptop procurement and said he had been detained.】

item.title: Figma 股价暴跌，原因是盈利低于上市后的高预期
item.description: Figma 公司第一季度盈利小幅增长，低于其 7 月份上市时的超高预期，股价在周四的盘前交易中下跌超过 15%。【原文：Figma's shares fell more than 15% in premarket trading on Thursday following a modest first-quarter earnings beat that fell short of the sky-high expectations set by its blockbuster July stock debut.】

item.title: 早间竞价债券反弹，科技股上涨
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 马来西亚推动 TikTok 进行年龄验证以保护未成年人
item.description: 马来西亚已敦促视频共享平台 TikTok 对用户实施年龄验证，此前还传唤了该公司的高层管理人员，要求加快行动遏制有害内容。【原文：Malaysia has urged the video-sharing platform TikTok to implement age verification for users after summoning the firm's top management to demand faster action to curb harmful content.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 VinFast 因雄心勃勃的增长战略投入巨资，季度亏损扩大
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast 周四公布，第二季度净亏损扩大，原因是该公司加大了全球扩张和营销方面的支出，以刺激需求并支持其雄心勃勃的增长战略。【原文：Vietnamese electric-vehicle maker VinFast on Thursday reported a wider second-quarter net loss as it stepped up spending on global expansion and marketing to spur demand and support its ambitious growth strategy.】

item.title: 印度提高服装税可能使全球时尚品牌受挫
item.description: 印度对消费税的全面改革将使从肥皂到豪华 SUV 的所有产品都变得更加便宜，但 Zara、Levi Strauss 和 Lacoste 等全球时尚品牌却因对所有售价超过 29 美元的服装征收更高的税款而受到了惊吓。【原文：India's overhaul of consumer tax stands to make everything from soaps to luxury SUVs cheaper, but global fashion brands such as Zara, Levi Strauss and Lacoste have been spooked by higher levies on all apparel priced at more than $29.】

item.title: 墨西哥 BMV 集团计划推出亚马逊等主要美股期权
item.description: 墨西哥主要证券交易所运营商首席执行官告诉路透社，该公司计划在今年年底前上市亚马逊、苹果和其他大公司等主要美股的期权。【原文：Mexico's main stock exchange operator plans to list options on major U.S. stocks such as Amazon , Apple and other big names by the end of this year, its chief executive told Reuters.】
